greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 0 if n is prime, otherwise A001222(n).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
maple: with(numtheory); f:=n->if isprime(n) then 0 else bigomega(n); fi;
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 12 2008
